mxCell.value:
Flags
Internet and LAN
not set

Ask user about endpoint
and save answer into list
Filter DNS replies according to Internet and LAN Flags
Check remote IP according to Internet, LAN and Localhost Flags

• Connections by the Portmaster itself are always allowed.
  • Connections are re-evaluated on the next new Link when a Profile has changed, Links are never re-evaluated.
  • Links may be inspected by additional modules, which can then deny previously permitted Links, but not permit previously denied ones.
  • Technically, inbound packets are always dropped, outgoing packets are blocked with a TCP Reset or an ICMP port-unreachable error message.

For a connection to be allowed it
must be accepted in all applicable flows.
